text: Egh a mangɨ Purirpenimɨn dɨvazimɨn aven dɨpamɨn bar uabɨ ruegh, egh ua uan ofa gamir gumazimɨn korotiar igharazibar aghuigh. A gɨn azenan izegh, ofan bar isia mɨghɨrir pumuning damigh, a ua bagh ofan tam damigh, egh ofan igharazim gumazamiziba bagh a damigh. Ofan kamningɨn, a uan arazir kuraba ko gumazamizibar arazir kuaba gɨn amadagham.
